organization.fullName: General Hospital of Shenyang Military Region

identificationModule.briefTitle: Quality Control Project of Stroke in Liaoning Province
identificationModule.officialTitle: Quality Control Project of Secondary Prevention and Treatment of Stroke in Liaoning Province

responsibleParty.investigatorAffiliation: General Hospital of Shenyang Military Region

descriptionModule.briefSummary: To reduce the incidence of stroke and standard the treatment of stroke in Liaoning Province, the present study should be conducted.

primaryOutcomes.measure: Key Performance Indicator of Secondary Prevention of Stroke in Liaoning Province
primaryOutcomes.description: The real KPI data such as intravenous thrombolysis number and quality, statin use, anti-platelet drugs, VET prevention, etc

secondaryOutcomes.measure: The results of Stroke prevention in Liaoning Province
secondaryOutcomes.description: The real data such as good neurological function outcome, stroke recurrence rate, death rate, etc.

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* ischemic stroke

Exclusion Criteria:

* disagreed patients
eligibilityModule.studyPopulation: All patients diagnosed with ischemic stroke
